description: A series of shorts commissioned for showing on Tv, but also distributed to theatres, about the AIDS crisis, homosexuality, and the reinvention of love in such conditions.
keywords: gay,male nudity,male frontal nudity,tv mini series,punctuation in title
name: L'@mour est à réinventer

review.name: Nice DVD Cover, Bad Movie
review.reviewBody: This is not a feature film, but a collection of 10 shorts. The total running time is 70 minutes. All except the first are in French with English subtitles. All are either directly or obliquely (sometimes very obliquely indeed) about AIDS. None are exceptional. I have been known to enjoy DVD collections of short gay-themed films. If some of them are not very good, at least I enjoy the different perspectives that filmmakers bring in their examination of what it means to lead a gay life. For me, none of these films was remotely interesting. If you are looking for some smart, sexy, French short films, rent the collection of François Ozon's short films that has been released to DVD.
